original_text: It will be very bad for you, teachers of God's Law and Pharisees. You are hypocrites! You build up the places where people have buried God's prophets. You make the places where they have buried good people to be beautiful.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 외식하는 서기관들과 바리새인들이여 너희는 선지자들의 무덤을 만들고 의인들의 비석을 꾸미며 이르되

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you
teachers of God's Law and Pharisees
where people have buried God's prophets
You make the places to be beautiful
where they have buried good people
